scripts.css: node-sass src/scss/litebox.scss dist/css/litebox.css; postcss dist/css/litebox.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/css --no-map
scripts.build:prod: node-sass src/scss/litebox.scss dist/css/litebox.min.css --output-style compressed; postcss dist/css/litebox.min.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/css --no-map; mkdir dist/js/; touch dist/js/litebox.min.js; babel src/js/litebox.js --out-file dist/js/litebox.min.js --compact
scripts.build:dev: npm run css; npm run js
scripts.build: npm run build:dev; npm run build:prod
